Chap. 1 - The Lord Loveth a Cheerful Giver.

                    Sanitarium, Cal., March 8, 1907. 

     I address the members of all our churches. We are living in a special period of this earth's history. A great work must be done in a very short time, and every Christian is to act a part in sustaining this work.
